channel.title: Live streams?
channel.description: Anyone doing live streams? Just a dev here who would like to see someone playing...

item.title: Live streams?
item.dc:creator: AwesomeIncarnate
item.description:
Not sure why my post was deleted but whatever:

https://www.youtube.com/TheAwesomeIncarnate

Hourly Videos - it’s pretty much like a livestream. Long ones too. 10-20 minute videos!

Read full topic

item.title: Live streams?
item.dc:creator: Mont_Blanc
item.description:
Joe33345:

Hey Onboard,

I represent a part of Lagspike.tv. I saw you came by our stream just a few hours ago and I wanted to see if Lagspike.tv might be able to conduct an interview with the developers, if we can. Just ask some standard questions in a Skype call basically about development on the project, the progress, the ideas behind the actual constructivity and the future. If you guys would like to sit down with us for maybe 30 mins and discuss Black Mesa: Source, that’d be awesome

Joe Delaney - LagSpike.tv Staff Member

You should PM him rather than post here, it’s way more effective.

Read full topic

item.title: Live streams?
item.dc:creator: OnboardError
item.description:
Gevil:

Hey,

just finished a 4 hour session.

https://www.twitch.tv/gevil_burx/b/332168551

don’t mind the hungarian mumbling in the background sometimes

Had an awesome time so far.

Excellent job on the mod its perfect.

cool ill take a look man
